={
  "field_6800": "{{ $json.original_data.extracted_data.client_name }}",
  "field_6801": "Quality Score: {{ $json.quality_metadata.final_quality_score }}/100 ({{ $json.quality_metadata.quality_category }})",
  "field_6802": "Concerns: {{ $json.quality_metadata.quality_concerns.join('; ') || 'None specific' }}",
  "field_6803": "{{ new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0] }}",
  "field_6804": "Local Mistral-7B + Vector Context",
  "field_6805": "{{ $json.quality_metadata.context_enhanced ? 'Yes' : 'No' }}"
}
